english.segment1: A red priest broke into our classroom. Caught us children by attention. "Listen closely to the words I speak. Lord knows if we'll ever, ever again meet"
english.segment2: Spoke such words never spoken before. On the way he declared there were. Miracles like you've never seen. From a man who was raised up in the sea
english.segment3: A man is coming in thirteen-one. To charm the daughters and the sons. Scared for our lives, I turned to your hand. Hold this tight while we run, if we still can
english.segment4: What disasters may come. Whatever it may be. At the end of the age. It will land you and me. What tragedy may bring. Whatever may fall. The end of the world. You'll still belong
